means.word_mean: 开放的,会交际的,友好的

entry.def: If you describe someone as approachable, you think that they are friendly and easy to talk to.

example.ex: We found him very approachable and easy to talk with.
example.tran: 我们认为他非常和蔼可亲，容易交谈。

entry.tran: 易于理解的；容易接受的
entry.def: If you describe an idea or piece of work as approachable, you think that it is presented in a way which people find enjoyable and easy to understand.

example.ex: The text is approachable, coping well with quite complicated subjects.
example.tran: 这篇课文把相当复杂的主题讲述得深入浅出、通俗易懂。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being read with comprehension;

sentences.sentence: "the tales seem more approachable than his more difficult novels"

means.word_mean: 2. easy to meet or converse or do business with;

sentences.sentence: "a site approachable from a branch of the Niger"

sentences.en: I wanted to appear friendly and approachable but I think I gave the converse impression.
sentences.cn: 我想显得友好、平易近人些,却发觉给人的印象恰恰相反。

sentences.en: The judge was a stern,unapproachable man.
sentences.cn: 那位法官是个严肃、难以接近的人。
